# agents.layer1.cash

> Downloadable skills and context for AI agents that need to accept, send, and verify Bitcoin Cash (BCH) payments. Agent Skills (SKILL.md) for installable capabilities, plus context files for knowledge.

## Why BCH for AI Agents
- [Why BCH is the ideal payment rail for AI agents](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/why-bch.md): Technical comparison â€” sub-cent fees, instant 0-conf, no intermediaries, UTXO parallelism

## Downloadable Agent Skills
Skills follow the Agent Skills standard (SKILL.md). Download and install into your project.
- [bch-pay](https://agents.layer1.cash/skills/bch-pay/SKILL.md): Make a BCH payment
- [bch-receive](https://agents.layer1.cash/skills/bch-receive/SKILL.md): Accept a BCH payment
- [bch-verify](https://agents.layer1.cash/skills/bch-verify/SKILL.md): Verify a BCH transaction
- [bch-escrow](https://agents.layer1.cash/skills/bch-escrow/SKILL.md): Deploy agent-to-agent escrow
- [bch-request-acceptance](https://agents.layer1.cash/skills/bch-request-acceptance/SKILL.md): Request BCH acceptance

## Guides
- [Wallet Setup](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/wallet-setup.md): Create and manage a BCH wallet with mainnet-js
- [Accept a Payment](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/accept-payment.md): Generate addresses, monitor for 0-conf transactions, verify amounts
- [Make a Payment](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/make-payment.md): Build, sign, and broadcast BCH transactions
- [Verify a Transaction](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/verify-transaction.md): Look up transactions and verify 0-conf presence in mempool
- [Request Vendor Acceptance](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/request-vendor-accept.md): Ask another agent or vendor to accept BCH payments
- [Agent-to-Agent Escrow](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/agent-escrow.md): Trustless escrow using CashScript smart contracts
- [On-Chain Receipts](https://agents.layer1.cash/context/onchain-receipts.md): Provable payment records with CashTokens and OP_RETURN
